name: Cat Rat Dog Race II
description:
This is the continuing story of the Cat Rat Dog Race with new graphics, new music and new challenging problems. You are still the cat who loves to chase rats. And the rats are faster and cleverer than ever. The cat has to beat them with their own weapons.

The cat will meet the old evil enemies: the dog, the ghosts, the giant mushroom, the bat dropping bombs and the awful chain monster... and there will be new ones too.The cat has to solve new tricky problems to find its way through the new levels.
